QuestData.Title: Escape from Coilskar Cistern
QuestData.Description: Thank the Earthmother! I parted ways with the others several days ago. I was intent on discovering the source of the disturbance that the spirits of water were feeling. My search led me to Coilskar where I discovered that the naga were befouling the water supply of Shadowmoon Valley.$B$BUnfortunately, I was discovered and taken prisoner. There's no telling what ghastly things they had in store for me.$B$BWe must leave this place! Help me escape and then seek out Torlok at the Altar of Damnation.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Earthmender Wilda out of Coilskar Cistern and then seek out Earthmender Torlok at the Altar of Damnation, found at the western outskirts of the Hand of Gul'dan.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Earthmender Torlok at the Altar of Damnation in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.RewardText: Praise the Earthmother. I am certain that Wilda will find her way home. Please accept this as a token of our appreciation.
